name: İmdat Yetiş!
description:
Mr. İmdat who can't defecate outside his house, he has to walk from office to his house. Mr. İmdat in a veeery difficult situation, can he go to the home without being affected by environmental factors? Or will he be the nightmare of the municipality?

Credits:

Pınar FİDAN - Game Designer

Senem AKSAKAL - Game Designer

Yasin Ercüment ŞENLİK - Developer

Metehan YAŞAR - Developer
